block.p: LEAD: ''I've been advising members, at a more accelerated rate, about how they ought to conduct themselves. I've said, 'I don't know how many more pictures I've got to paint for you. We've got rules and we've got rules. If you want to protect yourself, keep yourself well inside the parameters.' ''

LEAD: ''I've been advising members, at a more accelerated rate, about how they ought to conduct themselves. I've said, 'I don't know how many more pictures I've got to paint for you. We've got rules and we've got rules. If you want to protect yourself, keep yourself well inside the parameters.' ''

''I've been advising members, at a more accelerated rate, about how they ought to conduct themselves. I've said, 'I don't know how many more pictures I've got to paint for you. We've got rules and we've got rules. If you want to protect yourself, keep yourself well inside the parameters.' ''
